channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Print Invoice & Delivery Notes for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Print Invoice & Delivery Notes for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-0479|2024-01-16T15:55:08.499Z -- unknown -- print%20invoice%20%26%20delivery%20notes%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Print Invoice & Delivery Notes for WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 4.7.2 is vulnerable to reflected XSS by echoing a GET value in an admin note within the WooCommerce orders page. This means that this vulnerability can be exploited for users with the edit_others_shop_orders capability. WooCommerce must be installed and active. This vulnerability is caused by a urldecode() after cleanup with esc_url_raw(), allowing double encoding.
